subject: Women
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mike Green matched his career high with 24 points and No. 12 Butler used a big second-half run to beat Cleveland State, 70-55, for its fifth Horizon League championship and first automatic berth in the N.C.A.A. tournament since 2001.
